attributes.action: Have School 3 Times A Week And Have Better Food
attributes.background: I want in school better food and fizzy drinks to be accepted

rejection.details:
We can see you'd like to make changes to the school week and the food you're provided with in school, but your petition doesn't set out a clear action for the Government. 

You could start a petition asking for the Government to require schools to make two weekdays part of the weekend. You could also sign this petition asking the Government to make Friday a part of the weekend: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597715

It isn't clear what you mean by "better foods". The decision over the individual drinks that schools sell is a matter for schools rather than the Government or Parliament.
